website_summaries.verdict: For a budget model, the Nike Air Versitile 3 has a lot to offer both on and off the court. Owners love the step-in comfort brought about by the heathered textile and air sole unit. The shoe's mid-top style also provides ankle protection and mobility.All in all, these affordable Nike basketball shoes are perfect for versatile players who like to do a little bit of everything on the hardwood.
pros: According to many buyers, the Nike Air Versitile III offers excellent quality for its affordable price
These Nike basketball shoes are quite comfortable to wear, a good number of owners comment
Most purchasers love the Nike Air Versitile 3's stylish design
They are saying that these mid-tops look good with different outfits
Several users appreciate the lightness of these Nike basketball shoes
Like the Nike Kyrie 6, a few are reporting that these mid-tops are very supportive and provide a lot of ankle protection
cons: The foam midsole of the Air Versitile III feels pretty stiff, some players gripe
A good number of wearers are saying that the toe box is quite snug
A few users are complaining that the shoe's eyelets ripped after just a couple of wears

customer_reviews.title: I love the look, but made my toes go to sleep sadly
customer_reviews.text: I tried playing basketball in these and they made my toes numb, I thought I may have done them too tight so the next time I kept them looser but it still did the same thing so I sent them back which was awesome they let me do that so that’s why I gave them a four-star because you can try them and then send in the back which I feel like you need to be able to do with basketball shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great for walking, not 'extreme' like a lot of sneakers-I usually prefer skateboard sneakers, but these are really comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Robert Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband and upon first wear the overlay by the laces broke. We retuned without a problem, but didn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: keri.lynn.n

customer_reviews.title: A little tight for wide feet but overall solid.
customer_reviews.text: A little narrow with thicker socks, but they are fine with thinner socks. I can move well in them and the support in the back is solid.
customer_reviews.author: chu

customer_reviews.title: No Confort
customer_reviews.text: Its really tight on my foot... I order a size 9 shoe and the shoe was tight... I have too wear my old shoes when I go out... Horrible shoe product 1 out of 5 for comfort... Do not buy this shoe please
customer_reviews.author: Ismael

customer_reviews.title: Run narrow
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes and well made but they run a half size to small and they're narrow....
customer_reviews.author: Carla Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fast Delivery.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered last July 22,2019, and I am expecting it would take about a week to receive my package, but to my surprise, I received the delivery of my package last July 25, 2019. Shoe fits well and legit. Can't wait to use this on my next basketball game.
customer_reviews.author: Tatlong Letrang K

customer_reviews.title: Tight fitting shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very tight fitting shoes. Don't know what it is with Nike basketball shoes but they always are tight fitting. I don't get that problem with their running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Paula M. Chastain

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I walk almost 3-4 miles /day and using these and knee high socks it becomes super easy.
customer_reviews.author: traderking

customer_reviews.title: Not for people with wider than normal feet
customer_reviews.text: The shoe quality is good, and the length for a 10.5 is correct. But if you have a wide feet this isn’t a shoe for you. My leg felt suffocated.
customer_reviews.author: Bala

customer_reviews.title: Cheap made
customer_reviews.text: After 3 days of 45 minute basketball practices, the shoe strings had pulled through the eyelets in the black flap. Cheap made.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Hall

customer_reviews.title: they r good
customer_reviews.text: they are very comfy and are amazing for basketball. have lots of grip.
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: Late shipping
customer_reviews.text: Nothing just that shipping took longer than told and then ended up being a size bigger
customer_reviews.author: Anonymos

customer_reviews.title: Fits tight but needs to be broken in.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my 13 year old daughter who plays basketball. She likes them but at first fits very tight. I told her to wear them for a while to break them in. She isn’t complaining about how tight they are any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin A. Romano

customer_reviews.title: No Good! Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes at a different store online for my husband, He hasn't even had them a year yet, and the bottom of shoes are coming unglued and they are just coming apart, He thought nike was supposed to be this reliable big name shoe, I guess that's what your paying for just the name, these are his first nike, and He said they suck and will never buy nike again He's had Walmart $25 shoes last waaay longer than these crap ass nike's pure junk, and he didn't wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kim F.

customer_reviews.title: Narrow
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 11 in Nikes. I bought these, tried them on, they felt okay, then made my feet go numb as someone else mentioned. Super super narrow. I returned them and bought them in size 12 because they did not have the 11.5's available. They are really comfortable on the sole and offer pretty good support for a 6-4 250 lb man. The twelves are a smidge long, but worth it for the overall comfort. I've only had these on for a little bit. Hopefully they don't make my feet go numb.
customer_reviews.author: MSLA MT

customer_reviews.title: The Were A Gift
customer_reviews.text: The person I purchased them for has not wore them yet They look very nice and looks as if they will make a good comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal C.

product_meta.title: Nike Air Versitile Iii Ao4430-002 Basketball Shoes
product_meta.description: Fast at all positions. True to the game and its name, nike air versitile iii men's basketball shoe gets you in the zone no matter what your playing style. A midfoot saddle stabilizes your foot as you angle toward the basket, while a nike air-sole unit cushions your heel on hard impacts. Visible air-sole unit in the heel provides impact cushioning. Midfoot saddle helps stabilize your foot when cutting from side to side. Circular traction pattern lets you pivot and change direction with ease.
